component.name: Adaptive EQ
component.summary: Automatically adjusts EasyEffects equalizer settings based on Spotify music

description.p: Adaptive EQ is an automatic equalizer adjustment tool for Linux audiophiles. This application automatically adjusts your EasyEffects equalizer settings based on what you're listening to in Spotify.

ul.li: Automatic EQ Adjustment: Detects the currently playing Spotify track and applies the appropriate EQ preset
Genre-Based EQ Profiles: Maps artists to genre-specific EQ presets for optimal sound
System Tray Interface: Convenient access to control and status information
Desktop Notifications: Notifications when EQ presets are changed
Offline Support: Caches track information for use when Spotify is offline
